message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000.  I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the value of the product. However, I'm looking for something closer to $13,000.  Would you be willing to meet me somewhere in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I'm still not able to meet at $13,000. I think $11,000 would be a fair compromise considering my budget constraints.
